annotations:
Dear Friends and colleagues
Good day,
Direct from very close owners friends to whom we done their last SNP transactions:
We can develop for sale the following IACS classed GC vessels.
MV HANA H
8104 DWT GC at 7.38mtrs draft
Built: 1998, UNL - Valencia, Spain
Flag: Barbados
Class: Polski Rejestr Statkow
SS due: 2028-05-31
LOA/Beam/Draft: 114.067/20.0/7.38
Ho/Ha: 2/2
Grain: 8437
Main engine: MAN 8L40/45
MV AZZA H
4207 DWT GC at 5.55mtrs draft
Built: 1991, Rebuilt 2006
Hamamoto, Japan
Flag: Panama
Class: Korean Register
SS due: 2026-08-12
LOA/Beam/Draft: 89.9/13.5/5.55
Ho/Ha: 1/1
Main engine: Niigata 6M34AFT
MV HELEN H
5,543  DWT GC at 6.47mtr draft
Built: 1996, Viana Do Castelo, Portugal
Flag: Panama
Class: Nippon Kaiji Kyokai
LOA/Beam/Draft: 100.53/16.5/6.314
Ho/Ha: 2/2
Grain: 6634
Container fitted
Main engine: MaK 8M32
Vessels reported to be in excellent condition and very well maintained.
Trading Med sea/ Europe
Full dets, photos, price guidance available here in case of interest.
Best regards
Ahmad Jaohar
Shipbroker
S&P - Chartering
United JMT Shipbrokers
p:+46188432196  m: +46 762575818
a:Stora Gatan 2E,  office No. 1501
722 09 Västerås, Sweden
w:www.unitedjmt.co.uk
